      • is_user1_logged_in

        public static boolean is_user1_logged_in()
        Checks the values of user 1's username and password to determine if they have logged in
        Returns:
        boolean logged in or not

      • is_user2_logged_in

        public static boolean is_user2_logged_in()
        Checks the values of user 2's username and password to determine if they have logged in
        Returns:
        boolean logged in or not

      • login_user1

        public static boolean login_user1()
        Asks user 1 for their username and password. Checks that the username and password matched regular expression rules
        Returns:
        boolean user successfully logged in

      • login_user2

        public static boolean login_user2()
        Asks user 2 for their username and password. Checks that the username and password matched RegEx rules
        Returns:
        boolean successfully logged in

      • verify_login

        public static boolean verify_login(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password)
        Loops through the users stored in the database, finds a user that matches the username and password provided
        Parameters:
        username - username that the user input when prompted
        password - password that the user input when prompted
        Returns:
        boolean found a matching user

      • is_username_taken

        public static boolean is_username_taken(java.lang.String username)
        Loops through all usernames stored in the database. Checks that the username entered is not taken by another user.
        Parameters:
        username - query username
        Returns:
        boolean the username is taken or not

      • add_user

        public static void add_user(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds the user to the database HashMap, then the database file is updated.
        Parameters:
        username - username that the user input when prompted
        password - password that the user input when prompted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - could not update database

      • register

        public static boolean register()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Asks the user for a username and password. Checks that the username is not taken, and that both the username and password match their RegEx pattern. If everything is valid, it is added to the database.
        Returns:
        boolean successfully registered
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - could not update database
